title: Biggest concern is the market sell-off becoming a 'self-fulfilling prophecy,' research firm warns
content: The global stock market sell-off of recent days could be a "self-fulfilling prophecy" and eventually lead to a recession, Morningstar DBRS analysts warned.
summary: The global stock market sell-off of recent days could be a "self-fulfilling prophecy" and eventually lead to a recession, Morningstar DBRS analysts warned.

title: As riots and disorder spread, some countries warn their citizens about traveling to the UK
content: Five countries have issued travel and safety warnings to their citizens living or visiting the U.K. as riots and street disorder continue to plague the country.
summary: Five countries have issued travel and safety warnings to their citizens living or visiting the U.K. as riots and street disorder continue to plague the country.

title: Japan's Nikkei sees best day since October 2008; logs record single-day jump in points

title: 10-year Treasury yield rebounds after hitting its lowest level in more than a year
content: Treasury yields bounced back on Tuesday as investors closely monitored a reversal of the previous day's global market sell-off.

title: Oil giant Saudi Aramco's second-quarter profit dips 3% on lower crude production volumes
content: Saudi Aramco reported $29.1 billion in net profit for the second quarter, a dip of 3% from the same period last year as production volumes remained low.

title: UNESCO uses emergency procedure to name Gaza site to both its ‘World Heritage’ and ‘In Danger’ lists

title: Investors are unwinding the biggest ‘carry trade’ the world has ever seen, SocGen strategist says
content: Carry trades refer to trades wherein an investor borrows in a currency with low interest rates and reinvests the proceeds in higher-yielding assets elsewhere.
summary: Carry trades refer to trades wherein an investor borrows in a currency with low interest rates and reinvests the proceeds in higher-yielding assets elsewhere.
